story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: Urgh! There are too many of them!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
President Lusamine, even if it’s just you,
please escape!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
No, I’m afraid I can’t. Everything will be fine—
leave this to me.
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: But, if we carry on like this—
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: the Aether Foundation’s last line of defense!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: Weren’t you planning on betraying the foundation?
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Er...well, yes, in a manner of speaking...
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Weren’t you also an informant? You were talking
to someone on the phone...
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Argh! Fine! Since we’re already in a mess,
I’ll confess!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I was looking for a job! A new job! I wanted to
move up the career ladder!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_1900_10:
President Lusamine! Just like them, I was frustrated
with you!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
But I was only trying to get hired here on Pasio
by someone who would treat me better—as a
retainer for Lear’s royal family!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
And here you all are, treating me like I’m
betraying the foundation!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_2200_10: I mean...if you look at your track record...
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_2300_10: So, the “president” you were talking to was...
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_2400_10: Yes! I was talking to the “president of Pasio”!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Since he holds the authority here on Pasio, you
could say he’s like the “president” of Pasio! I
wasn’t lying, OK?!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_2600_10: That’s a bit of a stretch...
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Does that mean you have nothing to do with this
series of incidents?
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_2900_10:
I’m cooperating with you to clear my name!
That’s all!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_3100_10: Unbelievable! You are insufferable! All of you!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_3200_10:
If what you did cost me my job, how would you
repay me?!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_3300_10:
If you’re frustrated with the foundation, then deal
with it like an adult!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_3400_10: Ugh! I don’t want to be lectured by you!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_3500_10:
If Team Rocket had reached out to you before us,
you would’ve betrayed the foundation, too!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_3700_10:
As the president, I have complicated feelings
right now...
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_3800_10: But what Faba said is correct!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_3900_10: Even if you’re frustrated with my methods...
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_4000_10:
it doesn’t mean you can misuse the
foundation’s technology.
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_4100_10:
I won’t allow you to do what you want—not with
the foundation, and not on Pasio!
story_alola_02_04000/2401_1001_4200_10: Th-that’s right! We won’t allow you!
